voice.name: zh-CN-YunyiMultilingualNeural

s.lang: Some of the Japanese characters can be combined with a diacritic mark known as
in the upper right corner of a character. Let's see how this works!

voice.s: The diacritic mark changes the pronunciation of the character. In the example above, the character は is combined with the diacritic mark and becomes the character ぱ.
